modules.description: This module provides an implementation for sending/receiving messages to/from another application process (local or remote) for both connection-oriented and connectionless protocols.

errors.description: Represents generic socket error, which contains the information related to the error.
This will returns once the given read timed out time exceed for socket reads.

types.description: Represents caller object in socket service resources and client callback service resources.

clients.description: Represents the socket client and related remote functions.
Initializes the UDP client based on the provided configurations.

listeners.description: Represents the socket listener on which the socket listener service is registered and started.
